title: Apps
description: Applications management screen for viewing and managing installed Android applications

features.name: List Installed Applications
features.description: Display all installed applications on the connected Android device
features.developer_perspective: Essential for debugging app-related issues and understanding device state

features.name: Application Information
features.description: Show detailed information about each application including package name, version, permissions
features.developer_perspective: Critical for development debugging and compatibility testing

features.name: App Management Actions
features.description: Perform actions like uninstall, clear data, force stop on applications
features.developer_perspective: Useful for testing app behavior and cleanup during development
